title: Dr. Marco Parets student mesmerised two men in nature / Hypnotic induction, Catalepsy
description:
This woman - Gica, is a student of Dr. Marco Paret. He teached her Fascination - the power of the gaze and Mesmerism. Putting the unique techniques she learned into practice, she was able to mesmerize two men in nature. They entered in deep hypnotic induction and Catalepsy trance states. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
